translation.Message_0_Page_0: Hmm, <pause> Ha. Looks like you'll be working clean up detail. Report to the Janitor for your tasks.
translation.Message_1_Page_0: Welcome! Report to <color=legendary>Sergeant First Class Damien</color> in the barracks for your tasks.
translation.Message_2_Page_0: Welcome back to society. Report to <color=legendary>Sergeant First Class Damien</color> in the barracks for your tasks.
translation.Message_3_Page_0: Glad to see another soldier made it. Report to <color=legendary>Sergeant First Class Damien</color> in the barracks for your tasks.
translation.Message_4_Page_0: Farming, huh? Report to <color=epic>Lead Botanist Daphne</color> in the Green Room for your tasks.
translation.Message_5_Page_0: Not a whole lot of fish down here, but welcome! Report to <color=epic>Lead Botanist Daphne</color> in the Green Room for your tasks.
translation.Message_6_Page_0: There is plenty for one of your skills to do down here! Report to <color=epic>Workshop Manager Hyperion</color> in the Workshop for your tasks.
translation.Message_7_Page_0: Another engineer! You can never have too many bright minds. Report to <color=epic>Workshop Manager Hyperion</color> in the Workshop for your tasks.
translation.Message_8_Page_0: An esteemed chef? I hope your word is as good as your food! Report to <color=uncommon>Chef Julian</color> in the Cafeteria for your tasks.
translation.Message_9_Page_0: Hm... <pause> You check out, but I've got my eyes on you just in case. Report to the Janitor for your tasks.
translation.Message_10_Page_0: A licensed doctor! Now that is a hot commodity! Report to the Med Bay for your tasks.
